reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: ICI-project between VTT and Thorn Park Construction Training Centre for environmentally sustainable education of the construction se
VTT:n ja Thorn Park Construction Training Centre:n IKI-hanke ympäristöllisesti kestävän rakennusalan koulutuksen kehittämiseksi

description.narrative: Hankkeen tavoitteena on kehittää uudenlaisia ympäristönäkökulmat huomioonottavia rakennusalan opetussuunnitelmia Lusakassa sijaitsevassa Thorn Park Construction Training Centre-ammattikoulussa. Edellä mainittua tavoitetta tukien tarkoituksena on my ös päivittää ammattikoulun opetuksellista ja tietoteknistä kapasiteettia.

The objective of the project is to develop and pilot new educational programs for the construction sector in the vocational training institute of Thorn Park Construction Training Centre situated in Lusaka. The aim is to enable more environmentally sustaina ble construction process and in order to support this objective the current educational and technological capacity of the training centre will be updated with the aid of ICT technologies.
